code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useAppState}from'../../../state/AppStateContext';import DocUpload from'../../../components/DocUpload';import ManualAccountForm from'../../../components/ManualAccountForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function ConnectChoose(_ref){let{onClose,onComplete}=_ref;const[mode,setMode]=useState('menu');const{setAccounts}=useAppState();const addLinked=arr=>setAccounts(prev=>[...prev,...arr]);if(mode==='menu'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"connect-choose",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"connect-options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"connect-button secondary",onClick:()=>setMode('upload'),children:"Upload documents (photo/PDF)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"connect-button secondary",onClick:()=>setMode('manual'),children:"Enter manually"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"connect-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"action-button secondary",onClick:onClose,children:"Cancel"})})]});}if(mode==='upload'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"connect-choose",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DocUpload,{onParsed:arr=>{addLinked(arr);onComplete();}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"connect-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"action-button secondary",onClick:()=>setMode('menu'),children:"Back"})})]});}if(mode==='manual'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"connect-choose",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ManualAccountForm,{onSave:acc=>{addLinked([acc]);onComplete();}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"connect-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"action-button secondary",onClick:()=>setMode('menu'),children:"Back"})})]});}return null;}
